section.name: Overview
section.p: There are two types of tests available for testing OpenJMS: unit and functional tests.

section.name: Unit tests
section.p: Unit tests are run as part of the build process.

section.name: Functional tests
section.p:
Functional testing is provided by JMS CTS. This includes:
a comprehensive test suite for testing JMS provider compliance to the JMS specification, and;
stress tests for measuring performance
Refer to the
Getting Started
page for instructions on testing OpenJMS using JMS CTS.
